title: App development for real-time irrigation scheduling
aim: Provide the farmer with a basic application notifying him about the irrigation requirements of the crop on the basis of natural environment around him like the weather, sun time, etc

title: Application Developer
aim: Aim was to develop a modular web application for Jyoti Cards. Admin can simply add delete all the UI components of the website from the admin panel. It also had features like real time inventory management and updates via whatsapp.

title: RaspHomeKit
aim: Home automation with Raspberry Pi. Features like RGB Led Strips blinks according to the music being played on the system, scheduled Irrigation for the balcony garden, etc

title: Social Network
aim: A fully functional blogging website. It has features including posting, comment threads, add/remove friends.

title: Text Editor
aim: A GUI Text-Editor with functionalities like spell-checker, autocomplete, MarkovText, WordPath.

title: Dog Vision
aim: Using Transfer Learning and TensorFlow 2.0 to Classify Different Dog Breeds.

title: Photo Album Here
aim: A Photos Web Application Layer for your local directory containing your precious photos. Still Working on it...

title: Facebook News
aim: An iOS Mobile Application which collects feeds from facebook pages and shows you in a beautiful format even when you have deactivated your FB account. You can Save a post you like.
